argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subrg1ascl.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | subrg1ascl.a | |- A = ( algSc ` P ) |
| 3 |  | subrg1ascl.h | |- H = ( R |`s T ) |
| 4 |  | subrg1ascl.u | |- U = ( Poly1 ` H ) |
| 5 |  | subrg1ascl.r | |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 6 |  | subrg1ascl.c | |- C = ( algSc ` U ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly R ) = ( 1o mPoly R ) |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_ply1ascl | |- A = ( algSc ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly H ) = ( 1o mPoly H ) |
| 10 |  | #P_1on | |- 1o e. On |
| 11 | 10 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> 1o e. On ) |
| 12 | 4, 6 | #P_ply1ascl | |- C = ( algSc ` ( 1o mPoly H ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 8, 3, 9, 11, 5, 12 | #P_subrgascl | |- ( ph -> C = ( A |` T ) ) |
